basics.name: Himanshu Jain
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Results-driven Software Engineer with a track record in designing, developing, and optimizing high-performance, scalable applications, proficient in diverse programming languages, and leveraging cutting-edge frameworks to enhance efficiency and innovation.

work.name: Cisco Systems
summary: Contributed to setting up the core infrastructure and platform components using Terraform and Kubernetes, with a strong focus on CI/CD integration throughout the process.
Worked actively on EKS Upgrade and Istio Upgrade of all data centres hosted on AWS with zero downtime.
Involved in multiple PoC to bring in CNCF hosted projects into the Pipeline like Metrics Server, External DNS, AWS Loadbalancers, Ratelimit and many more.
Migrated over 150 applications by redesigning the continuous delivery pipeline with Argo CD, enhancing deployment efficiency and reliability.
Developed Go-based applications, including a kubeconfig generator with customizable RBAC permissions, enabling multiple teams to securely access the Kubernetes cluster.

Enhanced cloud security for the product by implementing various policies at the S3 bucket, Kubernetes cluster, and IAM levels. Integrated GuardDuty and OPA for centralized monitoring and securing deployed resources.
Centralized secret management with Vault by consolidating credentials from sources like Jenkins, enhancing security and streamlining sensitive information management across the organization.

pdfs.title: A stellar job with Istio Upgrade

work.name: Cisco Systems
summary: Led an initiative to benchmark large-scale microservices utilizing WebSockets and Kafka, resulting in improved performance insights and optimized system scalability.
Integrated JMeter into the main pipeline to evaluate system performance under load, leading to a 25% improvement in response times and a 15% increase in service reliability.
Provided detailed profiling data, enabling the team to enhance scalability and deliver a better customer experience.
